title: Delicate Floral Diamond Studs - Pushpa Vantillu
features: Floral motif with prong-set diamonds. Six-petal design creates a light and airy feel. Secure post and friction back closure. Smooth Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
description: Elegant floral design blends modern aesthetics with timeless appeal. High-quality diamonds provide exceptional sparkle. Comfortable and lightweight for all-day wear. A perfect addition to any jewelry collection or a thoughtful gift for loved ones.
